Auto-generated from all feature plans. Last updated: 2026-01-10

## Active Technologies

- Python 3.11 (local dev uses 3.11.7 via .venv) + Microsoft Agent Framework (`agent-framework` pre-release), FastAPI, Uvicorn, Jinja2, python-dotenv, azure-identity (AzureCliCredential fallback). (001-hello-weather-app)

## Commands

cd src; pytest; ruff check .

## Code Style
